review_text: I made it a goal to stay in as many unique airbnbs as possible this year and let me tell you, this one is right at the top of my favorites. First off the pictures don’t do it justice. It was almost so beautifully done that I didn’t even want to put my stuff down and ruin the aesthetic! The dome itself is so incredibly unique but yet so homey feeling. At night when all was quiet, you could hear and see every leaf hit the dome, it was this incredibly serene sound almost like asmr. It was nature in surround sound! The amenities were flawless. The hot tub is always my favorite but I fell in love with the outdoor shower and decided my next home will have one. The water’s so hot that it didn’t even matter the exterior temp. Looking up at the lights and stars while you shower was just such an unexpected joy. The dome is tucked away off a quiet country road and private however there’s a six minute drive into a cute little town for great food. 10/10 stars for this immersive nature experience!
